data.event: Bostan and Zhob were connected by a narrow gauge railway track which was later dismantled around June 2008.

event.title: made it the longest Narrow gauge Railway of the subcontinent in 1920s

data.event: The total length of this railway from Bostan to Zhob was 294 km, which made it the longest Narrow gauge Railway of the subcontinent in 1920s.
